casebody.data:
DTH MEDIA CORPORATION, et al.
v.
FOLT, et al. 142PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Hugh Stevens, Attorney at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Michael J. Tadych, Attorney at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Stephanie A. Brennan, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Folt, Carol L., et al. Matt Burke, Solicitor General Fellow, for Folt, Carol L., et al. Troy D. Shelton, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Vicitim Rights Organizations. Jonathan D. Jones, Attorney at Law, for Student Press Law Center, et al.

*827The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of July 2019 by Amicus for Leave to Participate in Oral Argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
